segments.text: I see the woman standing at the sink area.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's carefully drying a plate with her towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is running, but the water's building up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's starting to spill over the sink's edge now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle forms on the floor beneath her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems completely focused on the dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Nearby, a boy climbs a stool to the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into the open cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands close, hand extended toward him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks a bit unsteady under his weight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden appears neat and green.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are stacked neatly on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This seems like a typical family kitchen moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll turn around soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The curtains are pulled back, letting in light.
segments.speaker: PAR
